page.title: 06SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES
page.content: IN THE WET WEATHER A LOT OF CHILDREN WATCH TELEVISION PROGRAMMES LIKE "TOM AND JERRY," " SEA VIEW" AND CARTOONS. ON THE DRY DAYS THEY GO DOWN TO THE PLAYGROUND IN CHURCH PARK.THERE ARE LOTS OF THINGS TO DO DOWN THERE. IF YOU DID NOT WANT TO WALK DOWN TO THE PLAYGROUND YOU COULD PLAY ON THE GREEN IN DRUMARD PARK.SOME MOTHERS ARE OUT WASHING THE WINDOWS.THE OLD PEOPLE ARE ALWAYS TALKING.THE FATHERS ARE AT WORK.SOME OF THEM READ PAPERS AND WATCH TELEVISION.A LOT OF CHILDREN PLAY WITH ROLLER BOOTS,OR BICYCLES. THE SMALLER CHILDREN PLAY WITH DOLLS AND SMALL TOY CARS.
